title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Oct 28 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Oct 28 2021
description:
Clay dives into the budget drama on Capitol Hill and explains why progressives are the Dems worst nightmare. Kids and masks should only be in abundance on Halloween. Floyd Mayweather speaks out against vaccine mandates and defends freedom loving fellow athletes. Mollie Hemingway on rigged elections and Big Tech and what we should expect in the next election cycle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
